description: Gets information about a scheduled audit. Requires permission to access the DescribeScheduledAudit action.

parameters.name: scheduledAuditName
parameters.description: The name of the scheduled audit whose information you want to get.

nested_items.name: frequency
nested_items.description: How often the scheduled audit takes place, either one of DAILY, WEEKLY, BIWEEKLY, or MONTHLY. The start time of each audit is determined by the system.

nested_items.name: dayOfMonth
nested_items.description: The day of the month on which the scheduled audit takes place. This is will be 1 through 31 or LAST. If days 29- 31 are specified, and the month does not have that many days, the audit takes place on the LAST day of the month.

nested_items.name: dayOfWeek
nested_items.description: The day of the week on which the scheduled audit takes place, either one of SUN, MON, TUE, WED, THU, FRI, or SAT.

nested_items.name: targetCheckNames
nested_items.description: Which checks are performed during the scheduled audit. Checks must be enabled for your account. (Use DescribeAccountAuditConfiguration to see the list of all checks, including those that are enabled or use UpdateAccountAuditConfiguration to select which checks are enabled.)

nested_items.name: scheduledAuditName
nested_items.description: The name of the scheduled audit.

nested_items.name: scheduledAuditArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the scheduled audit.
